message: So, I'm working on documentation for Biwako, which is written in Python 3, and I'm having problems with syntax coloring
That is to say, if I'm using at least certain kinds of Python 3 syntax, I get no coloring at all: http://readthedocs.org/docs/biwako/en/latest/getting-started.html
Notice that the snippet at the end, with the new metaclass syntax, is displayed bare
Some quick searching reveals problems using Sphinx's autodoc against Python 3 code, but I'm not using that, this is written right in the docs. Could it be a pygments issue?
Never mind, I found that I just need to set highlight_language='python3' in my conf.py and I'm all set.
